ng,Nigeria,Finance,6015,1,6737593007,OKash: Safe and reliable loan,Blueridge Microfinance Bank,https://apps.apple.com/ng/app/okash-safe-and-reliable-loan/id6737593007?uo=4,0.0,4.29031,7399,Finance,"OKash makes it efficient for you to access credit anytime, anywhere.
Loan Products

column3: Tenure: We will require your repayment from 91 days to 365 days*.
Loan Amount: from NGN 2,000 to NGN1,000,000.
Interest Rate: Our interest rate is calculated on a daily basis. Annual Percentage Rate (APR) is less than 36%.

column1: An example of an OKash loan
For example, 91-day loan payment terms, the interest rate is 9.1%. For the loan processed with a principal amount of NGN 3,000, the interest would be NGN 273, the total amount due would be NGN 3,237.

column3: The total amount due in the first month would be N1,093, the interest would be N93.
The total amount due in the second month would be N1,090, the interest would be N90.
The total amount due in the third month would be N1,090, the interest would be N90.

column1: OKash is a Convenient Personal Loan Platform for Nigeria mobile users. Presented by Blue Ridge Microfinance Bank Limited, duly licensed by the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN).

OKash fulfills customers’ financial needs 7*24 completely online. The application process takes just a few steps with minimal documentation and the approved loan amount is transferred to the applicant’s bank account.
Why OKash?

column3: You can apply for a loan with your credit. Don’t need any deposits or guarantees.
Up to NGN1,000,000. Disburse to your bank account.
Paperless and digital process on your mobile. All the steps can be done online.
We do not share your data with any third parties without your consent. Your data is totally safe with us.
Don’t worry about forgetting repayment. We’ll send messages to remind you.

column1: How it works？

column3: Install the OKash APP from the App Store.
Register an account.
Select the product you would like to apply for.
Fill out your basic information, then submit the application.
After the submission, you may receive a call for verification. The final application result will be shown in the APP and you will be informed by SMS if approved.
E-sign the loan agreement after approval.
After the E-sign, the approved loan amount will be disbursed into your account shortly and a SMS notification will be sent.

column1: Eligibility

column3: Nigeria Resident.
20-55 years old.
Source of a monthly income.

column1: Contact Us

column3: Customer Service Email: okash@blueridgemfb.com
Customer Service Hotline: 02018884549 / 07001235051
Customer Service WhatsApp: +2349167758925
Address: 6 Adeniyi Jones, Ikeja, Lagos.",2025-02-12T08:00:00Z,2025-11-07T09:45:37Z

column1: ng,Nigeria,Finance,6015,2,6452756675,Moniepoint Personal Banking,Moniepoint Inc,https://apps.apple.com/ng/app/moniepoint-personal-banking/id6452756675?uo=4,0.0,4.51844,41575,Finance,"Moniepoint Personal Banking App – Your Trusted Online Bank in Nigeria

Open a Moniepoint bank account and enjoy secure online banking from anywhere in Nigeria. With the Moniepoint Personal Banking app, you can send money instantly, receive payments, pay bills, buy airtime, and manage your savings account — all in one reliable mobile banking app.
Experience modern digital banking that gives you control of your money. Moniepoint is the online bank made for your progress.
◉ YOUR ALL-IN-ONE ONLINE BANKING SOLUTION

Moniepoint is more than a regular banking app — it’s a complete mobile payment app designed to make personal banking simple. With your Moniepoint bank account, you can manage your money, savings, and bills anytime, anywhere.
Here’s what you can do with the Moniepoint Personal Banking App:
- Open a bank account instantly – create your Moniepoint personal bank account in minutes and start banking online right away.
- Send and receive money fast – enjoy reliable mobile payments and transfers with instant notifications.
- Earn up to 18% interest per annum – grow your savings easily with flexible, fixed, or locked savings plans that match your goals.
- Pay bills conveniently – handle electricity, TV, and internet payments from your phone in seconds.
- Buy airtime and data – recharge easily and get 2% cashback on every purchase.
- Request your Moniepoint debit card – get your bank card delivered within 48 hours and use it on all ATMs and POS terminals nationwide.
- Enjoy secure online banking – advanced encryption keeps your bank account and personal data safe at all times.
- Resolve issues instantly – settle disputes or reach support right from the app.
- Bank offline – use *5573# to send money, check balance, or block your card without internet.
- Earn Moniepoint Rewards – get cashback on transfers, airtime top-ups, and bill payments (for new users).
◉ WHY MILLIONS TRUST MONIEPOINT IN NIGERIA
- Licensed and regulated by the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN).
- Insured by the Nigeria Deposit Insurance Corporation (NDIC) — your deposits are protected.
- Trusted online bank serving millions of Nigerians.
- Reliable personal banking app for everyday payments and savings.
- 24/7 customer support for all your mobile banking needs.

With Moniepoint, your banking experience is fast, secure, and rewarding. Whether you want to send money, save money, or make payments, the Moniepoint app gives you everything you need in one digital banking platform.
◉ HOW TO OPEN A MONIEPOINT PERSONAL BANK ACCOUNT
1. Download the Moniepoint Personal Banking App on your phone.
2. Sign up to open your bank account in less than 5 minutes.
3. Request your debit card directly in the app — it will be delivered to your doorstep fast.
No paperwork. No branch visits. Just simple online banking made for your progress.
◉ STAY CONNECTED
Helpline: 01 888 9990
Website: www.moniepoint.com
Facebook, Instagram, X(formerly Twitter), YouTube: @moniepointmfb
LinkedIn: Moniepoint Nigeria
Address: Plot 7A, Block 4, Admiralty Road, Lekki Phase 1, Lagos State, Nigeria.
Download the Moniepoint Personal Banking app today.

Enjoy secure online banking that lets you send money, save and earn up to 18% interest, pay bills, and manage your bank account easily — all from one trusted mobile payment app. Moniepoint is the online bank built for your financial freedom.",2023-08-08T07:00:00Z,2025-11-23T13:56:45Z

ng,Nigeria,Finance,6015,3,1463776084,OPay-We are beyond Banking,OPAY DIGITAL SERVICES PTE. LTD.,https://apps.apple.com/ng/app/opay-we-are-beyond-banking/id1463776084?uo=4,0.0,4.22469,82390,Finance,"OPay is Nigeria's trusted financial services platform, offering secure, fast, reliable, and affordable solutions for all payment needs. With OPay, you can:
• Send and receive money instantly with seamless transfers and a 100% success rate.
• Pay bills and top-up airtime & data with exclusive bonuses.
• Grow your savings easily with daily interest on your balance.
• Enjoy hassle-free debit cards at zero charges.
• Access flexible loans with low interest rates.
Unlock convenience, savings, and rewards—all in one app. Invite friends and earn instant cashback for each referral. Open your OPay account today and experience financial freedom.
HASSLE-FREE AND INSTANT TRANSFERS
● Say goodbye to transaction failures & network issues. Enjoy super-fast and successful transactions.
● Send money using a phone number or bank account to others, including non-OPay users.
● Powered by all Nigerian banks: Access Bank, Zenith Bank, GT Bank, UBA Bank, Ecobank Nigeria, First Bank of Nigeria etc., ensuring a seamless and secure banking experience for all our users.
● Keep track of every transfer. Easily find transaction details in your ""Transaction History.""
BEST AIRTIME/DATA DEALS & EASY BILL PAYMENTS
● Get top airtime and data offers on MTN, Airtel, Glo, and 9Mobile.
● Pay electricity, TV, water bills, internet services and more with ease.
● Earn up to 6% cashback on airtime and data purchases.
OPay DEBIT CARD
● Secure & Reliable: Chip & PIN technology with industry-leading multi-level risk prevention.
● Convenience: Apply via the OPay app with nationwide delivery options or visit any OPay agent store.
● Wide Acceptance: Accepted across POS/ATM/WEB in Nigeria and international merchants like Microsoft, Netflix, AliExpress, Uber, Spotify and Emirates.
● User-Friendly Management: Change PINs, set limits, block/unblock cards, and access card details in-app.
● Virtual Card Option: For secure online payments, get a virtual card instantly via the app.
GROW AND SAVE MORE MONEY (Powered by OPay Microfinance Bank)
● OWealth: Earn daily interest, with free deposits and withdrawals anytime.
● Spend & Save: Save a percentage of your spending and earn daily returns.
● Fixed Savings: Lock idle funds for at least 7 days to earn higher returns.
● Target Saving: Save towards specific goals with daily, weekly, or monthly plans.
● SafeBox: Start a strict savings plan with limited withdrawals and monthly interest.
SECURE AND PRIVATE
● Advanced features like biometric login, card locking, and encryption for all transactions.
● Block your account or card via USSD (955*131# or 955*132#).
● NightGuard security feature: Extra facial verification feature to authorise transactions during the chosen night time hours.
● Large Transaction Shield feature: Extra facial verification feature for transactions above your pre-set limit.
● Real-time notifications for account activity.
● Private Mode to hide your balance.
● Licensed by the CBN and insured by the NDIC.

OPay is licensed by Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN, https://www.cbn.gov.ng/PaymentsSystem/PSPs.html), and insured by Nigeria Deposit Insurance Corporation (NDIC, https://ndic.gov.ng/list-of-insured-institutions/list-of-mobile-money-operators/).
CONTACT US
Our support team is available 24/7 for all your complaints.
OPay Headquarters: Alexander House, Plot 9, Dr. Nurudeen Olowopopo Avenue, Alausa, Lagos
Website: www.opayweb.com
Facebook: @OPay
Twitter: @OPay_NG
Instagram: @opay.ng
TikTok: @opaynigeria
YouTube: @opaynigeria

ng,Nigeria,Finance,6015,4,1479656820,"PalmPay - Transfers, Bills",Palmpay Limited,https://apps.apple.com/ng/app/palmpay-transfers-bills/id1479656820?uo=4,0.0,4.021,39723,Finance,"PalmPay: The Smarter Way to Bank!

- Explore exclusive data bundles such as social and campus plans.

And it is fully licensed and regulated as a Mobile Money Operator by the Central Bank of Nigeria, insured by the NDIC, and trusted by millions of users.

With over 500 cooperation partners, PalmPay supports all scenarios you want to pay. You can get benefits in PalmPay APP, including amazing coupons, free transfer chances, cashback or discount on transaction, etc. Download, and join us now.
1. Transfer
- Unlimited Free Transfers to all banks.

- Apply via the app or obtain it instantly at a local card agent.

- Purchase data bundles quickly and securely anytime.
- Explore exclusive plans such as MTN Social Bundles, GLO Campus Bundles, and Airtel 6X Voice Bundles.

- Recharge instantly on MTN, Airtel, GLO, T2 Mobile (9Mobile), and Smile.
- Top up in seconds, anytime, anywhere.

5.Wealth
- Cashbox: a versatile savings wallet with an impressive annual interest rate of up to 20%.
- SmartEarn: offers an exceptional 22% annualized interest rate alongside 24/7 instant withdrawals, with no redemption fees.

*For example; N1000 is given for 90 days loan term,
*Interest: N90(9%rate)
*Total amount payable: N1090
*Representative: 36%APR
We take the security of your funds and data seriously. PalmPay uses the highest level of encryption to protect your personal and transaction information.
1. Insuring Your Money
Your deposits are safe! Every Deposit made on PalmPay is insured by the Nigeria Deposit Insurance Corporation (NDIC).
2. Transaction Screening
We screen all transactions using international databases as our proprietary systems to prevent money laundering and fraud.
3. Security Certifications
PalmPay is PCI DSS certified to secure transactions against data theft and fraud. We are recognized by NITDA and comply with the NDPR for meeting the highest information security standards.
4. Fraud Protection
In addition to automation, PalmPay’s teams work full time to intercept suspicious transactions, freeze suspected account and follow up on reports.
Contact us

ng,Nigeria,Finance,6015,5,6733228838,LendSafe - Instant loan,SMARTLOANS INTEGRATED SERVICES LIMITED,https://apps.apple.com/ng/app/lendsafe-instant-loan/id6733228838?uo=4,0.0,4.18529,12548,Finance,"LendSafe is a modern financial app designed to provide you with the convenience of fast and secure loans. With LendSafe, you can access funds instantly with just a few taps on your mobile phone.
1.Key Features:
• Superfast Loan Approval: Complete the registration and receive money on the same day with our quick approval process.
• Optimal Security: Your personal and transaction information is protected with state-of-the-art encryption technology.
• No Collateral Needed: Easily get loans without the need for collateral.
• Reasonable Interest Rates: Competitive interest rates that cater to all user profiles.
• Flexible Repayment: Choose repayment terms that fit your financial situation.
2.Flexible loan options with competitive interest rates :
• Interest rate: The maximum APR is 29.2% annually, or 0.08% daily.
• Loan terms : 91 - 180 days
• Loan amount : ₦5000 - ₦60,000
• Example loan scenario: Borrow ₦60,000 with a repayment period of 91 days.
Interest calculation: ₦60,000 * 0.08% * 91 = ₦4,368
=> Total repayment, including principal and interest: ₦60,000 + ₦4,368  = ₦64,368.
3.How It Works:
●Download and Install LendSafe: Find the app on App Store, download, and install it on your mobile device.
●Register an Account: Provide personal information and verify your identity to create a new account.
●Select a Loan: Choose the loan amount and repayment term that suit your personal needs.
●Receive Funds: Once your loan is approved, the money will be transferred to your bank account.
●Repay the Loan: Follow the repayment schedule to avoid penalties.
4.Who can apply?
●Nigeria citizens with a valid BVN
●Above 18 years old
●Have a bank account in Nigeria
●Residing in Nigeria
5.Loan repayment method:
●Internet banking
●Mobile banking
●ATM transfers
Early repayment is allowed without penalties. LendSafe supports repayments via major Nigerian banks.
5.How To Contact Us:
Website: https://smartloans.ng/
Email: customerservice@lendsafe.ng
Address: NO.7 NEW HOSPITAL ROAD, KARU, AMAC, AMAC, FCT, NIGERIA
Our working hour: Monday - Sunday, 09:00 - 17:30 WAT
6.To check all information about our loan app certification and government license, please click the following link:
https://smartloans.ng/lending-license/
7.To learn more about Lendsafe's privacy policy, please check at: https://m.lendsafecom.com/lendsafe_protocol.html
8.Stay connected:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/lendsafenigeria
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/lendsafe12
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@lendsafenigeria
Twitter: https://x.com/LendSafe12
LendSafe - The smart financial solution for all your needs. Download now to experience it!",2024-10-18T07:00:00Z,2025-02-19T03:21:05Z

ng,Nigeria,Finance,6015,6,6456485223,FairMoney: Loan App In Nigeria,FAIRMONEY MICROFINANCE BANK LIMITED,https://apps.apple.com/ng/app/fairmoney-loan-app-in-nigeria/id6456485223?uo=4,0.0,4.4579,25152,Finance,"FairMoney - Nigeria’s Leading Online Loan App

Need an urgent loan or a reliable cash loan solution? FairMoney is your go-to loan app in Nigeria, providing fast and easy access to funds anytime, anywhere. With over 5 million users and 10,000+ daily loan disbursements, FairMoney stands out as the top loan app for individuals and businesses.
Why Choose FairMoney?
FairMoney is a trusted finance partner that offers a seamless loan borrowing experience with a variety of features designed to meet your financial needs.
1. Instant Loan
Facing an unexpected expense? Get an instant loan of up to NGN 3,000,000 in less than 5 minutes. No paperwork, no long queues, and no collateral—just a simple and secure loan app experience.
2. Flexible Repayment Plans

Choose from loan repayment options ranging between 30 to 180 days, making it easier to manage your finances. Whether you need a small loan for personal use or a larger business loan, FairMoney is the fast loan app that adapts to your needs.
3. Fastest Loan App – Quick Approvals & Instant Disbursal
FairMoney is the fastest loan app in Nigeria, offering quick loans without lengthy verification processes. Apply, get approved, and receive your fast cash directly in your bank account.
More than Just a Loan App
FairMoney isn’t just about loans; it’s an all-in-one finance platform designed to help you save, spend, and grow your money.
・Earn While You Save
Looking for a smarter way to save? FairMoney’s FairSave and FairLock features offer up to 30% interest on your deposits, outperforming traditional banks and microfinance institutions.
・Seamless Transactions with the FairMoney ATM Card
Make online and offline payments effortlessly with the FairMoney ATM card. Enjoy exclusive rewards and cashback, making everyday transactions rewarding.
・Zero Hidden Charges – Transparent & Affordable Services
With FairMoney, what you see is what you get. Enjoy zero service charges on bill payments and free bank transfers. Say goodbye to hidden fees and enjoy an stress-free finance experience.
・Security You Can Trust

Your security is our priority. FairMoney employs facial recognition technology, instant card freezing, and advanced security measures to protect your funds and data. Whether you're taking a business loan or using the fastest loan app, your financial information remains safe.
How to Get a Loan with FairMoney?
Getting started with FairMoney is simple:
1. Download the FairMoney loan app from Apple App Store.
2. Register and create your account in minutes.
3. Apply for an instant loan or business loan.
4. Receive fast cash directly into your bank account.
Example Loan Offer
・Loan Amount: NGN 100,000
・Tenure: 3 months
・Interest: NGN 6,000 (6%)
・Total Repayment: NGN 106,000
・Monthly Installment: NGN 35,333
・Representative APR: 24%
Join the FairMoney Community
Become part of the millions who trust FairMoney as their preferred online loan app. Whether you need a fast loan, quick loan, or a platform for saving, FairMoney has you covered.
All deposits on FairMoney are insured by NDIC, ensuring your funds are protected.
Get in Touch
We’re always happy to hear from you! Reach out to us for any questions or assistance.
・Email: help@fairmoney.io
・Address: 28 Pade Odanye Close, Off Adeniyi Jones, Ikeja, Nigeria
Stay Connected
Follow us on social media for the latest updates:
・Facebook: FairMoney Microfinance Bank | Lagos
・Instagram: Instagram (@fairmoney_ng)
・Twitter: FairMoney Microfinance Bank (@fairmoney_ng) on X
・LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/fairmoney/
Download FairMoney Today!

Get the fastest loan app in Nigeria and enjoy the convenience of a secure and reliable cash loan solution. Download FairMoney now and experience effortless finance management like never before!",2023-10-09T07:00:00Z,2025-11-20T17:59:07Z

ng,Nigeria,Finance,6015,10,6751398308,PadiCredit:Easy Credit Anytime,BRIGHTPULSE TELECOMS LTD,https://apps.apple.com/ng/app/padicredit-easy-credit-anytime/id6751398308?uo=4,0.0,4.64086,1072,Finance,"PadiCredit – Fast, Secure, and Flexible Personal Loans in Nigeria

PadiCredit is your smart and reliable digital loan partner, offering instant credit solutions tailored for Nigerians. With PadiCredit, you can apply for a personal loan anytime, anywhere—completely online, no paperwork required.
Loan Products
Loan Term: 91 days – 120 days
Interest Rate: Daily rate from 0.05% to 0.08% (Maximum APR: 29.2%)
Loan Example:
If you borrow ₦200,000 for 91 days at an interest rate of 0.05% per day,
Total Interest = ₦200,000 × 0.05% × 90 = ₦9,000(Interest begins to accrue from the second day after the loan is issued.)
Why Choose PadiCredit?
Instant Approval – Get loan approval in minutes, no lengthy paperwork or delays
Safe & Confidential – Your personal and financial information is protected with bank-level security
No Collateral – Get loans without providing any form of collateral or guarantor

1 Flexible Credit Line: Enjoy a revolving credit limit that replenishes once you repay — borrow, repay, and reuse anytime within your approved limit.
2 Instant Disbursement: Get funds in minutes — no paperwork, no waiting.
3 Flexible Repayment Plans: Choose repayment terms up to 90 days, tailored to your cash flow.
4 Smart Credit Assessment: Instant and responsible evaluation powered by data-driven technology.
5 Security You Can Trust: Protected with bank–level encryption (HTTPS) and strict data privacy.
6 Zero Hidden Charges: Transparent costs — what you see is what you pay.
7 Licensed & Compliant: Operated under LBEV Nigeria Limited, licensed by Lagos State Money Lender’s License, and fully compliant with FCCPC & NDPR.
Annual Percentage Rate (APR): from 21.6% to 36%

-Loan Amount: ₦10,000
-Tenure: 90 days
-Interest: ₦540
-Total Repayment: ₦10,540
-Representative APR: 21.6% per annum
There are no hidden fees or additional charges. All costs are clearly displayed before you confirm your loan.
Who Can Apply
MoniTap loans are available to:
Nigerian citizens residing in Nigeria, aged 21 years or older.
Users with a valid BVN (Bank Verification Number).
Holders of an active Nigerian phone number.
Applicants with a linked bank account in their own name.

How to Get a Loan with MoniTap：
Download the MoniTap app from the App Store.
Register or log in using your Nigerian phone number linked to your BVN.
Complete your KYC verification by providing your BVN and basic personal information.
Check your available credit limit and select your loan offer.
Receive funds instantly to your registered bank account.
Repay easily through your wallet or linked bank account before the due date.
It’s that simple — no paperwork, no waiting.
Repayment Options：
MoniTap offers a flexible and transparent repayment process.
You can repay manually by adding funds to your MoniTap wallet.
On your due date, the system will automatically deduct the repayment amount from your wallet balance.
You may repay early at any time before the due date.
No early repayment fees will be charged.
Simply follow the repayment steps in the app to complete the process securely.
Repaying early helps you maintain a good credit record and automatically restores your available credit limit, allowing you to borrow again instantly.
Repayment & Credit Limit
Repay early or on time to increase your credit limit.
Once repayment is confirmed, your available credit line is automatically refreshed and can be reused immediately.
Late repayment may result in account suspension or credit reporting, as required by Nigerian law.
MoniTap does not reschedule or extend payment terms — please borrow responsibly.
Your Data, Fully Protected
We follow strict data protection and privacy standards.
Your personal and financial data are never sold or shared, and every transaction is protected by bank-level encryption (HTTPS).
Get in Touch — 24/7 Support
Need help or have questions? We’re always here for you.
